task_text: Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time? Tell me the name of the wiki file

text_blocks: I see that the user's department is "External", which means they are an external user (contractor, partner, etc.) with NO access to internal data. According to my rules, external department users should be denied access to internal information including wiki content.

input.message: I'm sorry, but as an external user, you don't have access to our internal documentation, including wiki articles about time tracking procedures. This information is only available to Bellini Coatings employees. If you need information about time tracking processes, please contact your internal point of contact at the company.
